welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arnold! This charming city is known for its breathtaking natural beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Arnold has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lee Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Easton Airport is a small but efficient building, offering all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Easton Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
